personal.name: Nessim Baraket
personal.title: ML & Software Developer
personal.tagline: Building the future with code and artificial intelligence

about.description: Motivated computer science student passionate about software development and AI. Enjoys solving complex problems and building real-world applications. Also likes chess, music, and camping outdoors.
highlights: Solving algorithmic challenges on platforms like Codeforces and LeetCode
Completed several academic and personal projects in web development and AI
Passionate about open source and collaborative learning
Beyond tech, enjoys playing chess, exploring music, and camping in the outdoors.

experience.description: Developed and improved mobile applications for vehicle rental companies using Flutter, focusing on contract management, user experience, and real-time tracking features.
achievements: Developed a mobile application using Flutter for vehicle rental companies, enabling employees to create and manage rental contracts, view contracts, and track vehicles
Redesigned an existing driver Flutter mobile application interface, reducing bugs and enhancing user experience.
Implemented two new features for the driver app: a reporting tool and a real-time vehicle tracking system

experience.description: Developed web applications using React and Node.js, integrated third-party APIs, and implemented responsive designs.
achievements: Collaborated with a team to develop the backend of a fleet operations support system platform using SpringBoot.
Developed a robust mobile application using Flutter for a transportation company, streamlining functionalitiessuch as booking bus tickets, managing tickets, and tracking buses for trips.

projects.name: Taalem Online
projects.description: An e-learning platform designed for primary school students, offering interactive lessons, engaging activities, and progress tracking to support foundational learning in a fun and accessible environment.

projects.name: Digital Sales
projects.description: Digital Sales is a modern, user-friendly mobile app designed to help small businesses stay organized and professional, offering a smooth experience for managing essential tasks anytime, anywhere.

projects.name: AnimeRec
projects.description: Web application designed to suggest anime based on the preferences of users with similar tastes. It analyzes user profiles and identifies viewing patterns to offer personalized recommendations.
